text: @Jacob_Rees_Mogg The govt. & Boris Johnson's handling of covid19 crisis is equally bad as Dominic Cummings's cover up, if not worse! This has broken the complete trust in the democratic parliament, laws and rules of morality in British Politics! Shame on Tory govt MPs & the PM. Disgraceful!

entity.name: Dominic Raab eliminated from Conservative leadership race
entity.description: The number of candidates in the Conservative leadership race goes down to five as Dominic Raab failed to meet the required 33-vote threshold.
